Title: Meatballs III: Summer Job
Writer: Janis Allen (characters), Len Blum (characters), Daniel Goldberg (characters), Bradley Kesden, George Mendeluk, Michael Paseornek, Harold Ramis (characters)
Actors: Sally Kellerman, Patrick Dempsey, Al Waxman, Isabelle Mejias
Plot: A dead porno movie star returns from the beyond to help a nerdy teen to score with the beautiful wife of the owner of the camp he is spending the summer working at. Wow.
